I think I have just the right movie for you! Have you considered "The Last Unicorn"? It's a beautifully animated classic that tells the story of a young unicorn on a quest to discover if she's the last of her kind. With an all-star voice cast, including Angela Lansbury and Christopher Lee, this film is sure to delight.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more contemporary, "What If..." might be up your alley! This romantic drama explores the idea of fate and what could have been, set against the stunning backdrop of ancient Greece. Give it a try!
